00046 class _OgreRTSSExport HLSLProgramWriter : public ProgramWriter
00047 {
00048 
00049     // Interface.
00050 public:
00051 
00055     HLSLProgramWriter();
00056 
00058     virtual ~HLSLProgramWriter();
00059 
00063     virtual void writeSourceCode(std::ostream& os, Program* program);
00064 
00068     virtual const String& getTargetLanguage() const { return TargetLanguage; }
00069 
00070     static String TargetLanguage;
00071 
00072     // Protected methods.
00073 protected:
00074 
00076     void initializeStringMaps();
00077 
00079     void writeProgramDependencies(std::ostream& os, Program* program);
00080 
00082     void writeUniformParameter(std::ostream& os, UniformParameterPtr parameter);
00083 
00085     void writeFunctionParameter(std::ostream& os, ParameterPtr parameter);
00086 
00088     void writeLocalParameter(std::ostream& os, ParameterPtr parameter);
00089 
00091     void writeFunctionDeclaration(std::ostream& os, Function* function, bool & needToTranslateHlsl4Color, ParameterPtr & colorParameter);
00092 
00094     void writeAtomInstance(std::ostream& os, FunctionAtom* atom);   
00095 
00096 protected:
00097     typedef map<GpuConstantType, const char*>::type     GpuConstTypeToStringMap;
00098     typedef map<Parameter::Semantic, const char*>::type ParamSemanticToStringMap;
00099 
00100     // Attributes.
00101 protected:
00102     // Map between GPU constant type to string value.
00103     GpuConstTypeToStringMap mGpuConstTypeMap;
00104     // Map between parameter semantic to string value.
00105     ParamSemanticToStringMap mParamSemanticMap;
00106 };
00107 
00111 class _OgreRTSSExport ShaderProgramWriterHLSLFactory : public ProgramWriterFactory
00112 {
00113 public:
00114     ShaderProgramWriterHLSLFactory()
00115     {
00116         mLanguage = "hlsl";
00117     }
00118     virtual ~ShaderProgramWriterHLSLFactory() {}
00119 
00123     virtual const String& getTargetLanguage(void) const
00124     {
00125         return mLanguage;
00126     }
00127 
00131     virtual ProgramWriter* create(void)
00132     {
00133         return OGRE_NEW HLSLProgramWriter();
00134     }
00135 
00136 private:
00137     String mLanguage;
00138 
00139 };
